attributes.action: Urge Elliot Morley M.P. to resign his Seat as Member of Parliament for Scunthorpe to allow a by-election to take place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the relevations of Mr. Morley's error in claiming for the expense of a non-existent mortgage, he needs to be replaced as quickly as possible by a new M.P.  This is especialy important at a time when many people in Scunthorpe are fearful of losing their jobs and homes and need to turn to an M.P. who enjoys normal respect.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
